name: Translate
description:
Translate helps you test your UI against different languages to see what may break by using the Yandex Translate API to translate your text layers into other languages.

This plugin requires you to get a free Yandex Translate API key which you can do here https://tech.yandex.com/translate/ once you have the key, launch the app and paste it into the API key field. We never share your key or send it anywhere it is stored locally to your Figma app.

Currently supported languages:
Chinese
Dutch
English
French
German
Hindi
Italian
Japanese
Malayalam
Polish
Portuguese
Spanish
Swedish
Tamil
Vietnamese
